00025 using System;
00026 using System.Collections.Generic;
00027 using MathNet.Numerics;
00028 using MathNet.Numerics.Properties;

00030 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Interpolation.Algorithms
00031 {
00035     public class LimitedOrderPolynomialInterpolation :
00036         IInterpolationMethod
00037     {
00038         SampleList _samples;
00039         int _maximumOrder;
00040         int _effectiveOrder;
00041 
00045         public
00046         LimitedOrderPolynomialInterpolation()
00047         {
00048             _maximumOrder = int.MaxValue;
00049             _effectiveOrder = -1;
00050         }
00051 
00055         public
00056         LimitedOrderPolynomialInterpolation(
00057             int maximumOrder
00058             )
00059         {
00060             _maximumOrder = maximumOrder;
00061             _effectiveOrder = -1;
00062         }
00063 
00068         public bool SupportsDifferentiation
00069         {
00070             get { return false; }
00071         }
00072 
00077         public bool SupportsIntegration
00078         {
00079             get { return false; }
00080         }
00081 
00086         public int MaximumOrder
00087         {
00088             get
00089             {
00090                 return _maximumOrder;
00091             }
00092 
00093             set
00094             {
00095                 if(value < 0)
00096                 {
00097                     throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("value");
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 if(_maximumOrder == value)
00101                 {
00102                     return;
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 if(null == _samples)
00106                 {
00107                     _maximumOrder = value;
00108                     _effectiveOrder = -1;
00109                     return;
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 _maximumOrder = value;
00113                 _effectiveOrder = Math.Min(value, _samples.Count);
00114             }
00115         }
00116 
00121         public int EffectiveOrder
00122         {
00123             get { return _effectiveOrder; }
00124         }
00125 
00131         public
00132         void
00133         Init(
00134             IList<double> t,
00135             IList<double> x
00136             )
00137         {
00138             Init(new SampleList(t, x));
00139         }
00140 
00145         public
00146         void
00147         Init(
00148             SampleList samples
00149             )
00150         {
00151             if(null == samples)
00152             {
00153                 throw new ArgumentNullException("samples");
00154             }
00155 
00156             _samples = samples;
00157             _effectiveOrder = Math.Min(_maximumOrder, samples.Count);
00158         }
00159 
00165         public
00166         double
00167         Interpolate(
00168             double t
00169             )
00170         {
00171             if(null == _samples)
00172             {
00173                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.InvalidOperationNoSamplesProvided);
00174             }
00175 
00176             int closestIndex;
00177             int offset = SuggestOffset(t, out closestIndex);
00178             double[] c = new double[_effectiveOrder];
00179             double[] d = new double[_effectiveOrder];
00180             int ns = closestIndex - offset;
00181             double den, ho, hp;
00182             double x = 0;
00183 
00184             if(Number.AlmostEqual(_samples.GetT(closestIndex), t))
00185             {
00186                 return _samples.GetX(closestIndex);
00187             }
00188 
00189             for(int i = 0; i < _effectiveOrder; i++)
00190             {
00191                 c[i] = _samples.GetX(offset + i);
00192                 d[i] = c[i];
00193             }
00194 
00195             x = _samples.GetX(offset + ns--);
00196             for(int level = 1; level < _effectiveOrder; level++)
00197             {
00198                 for(int i = 0; i < _effectiveOrder - level; i++)
00199                 {
00200                     ho = _samples.GetT(offset + i) - t;
00201                     hp = _samples.GetT(offset + i + level) - t;
00202                     den = (c[i + 1] - d[i]) / (ho - hp);
00203                     d[i] = hp * den;
00204                     c[i] = ho * den;
00205                 }
00206 
00207                 x += (2 * (ns + 1) < (_effectiveOrder - level) ? c[ns + 1] : d[ns--]);
00208             }
00209 
00210             return x;
00211         }
00212 
00213         int
00214         SuggestOffset(
00215             double t,
00216             out int closestIndex
00217             )
00218         {
00219             closestIndex = Math.Max(_samples.Locate(t), 0);
00220             int ret = Math.Min(
00221                 Math.Max(
00222                     closestIndex - (_effectiveOrder - 1) / 2,
00223                     0
00224                     ),
00225                 _samples.Count - _effectiveOrder
00226                 );
00227 
00228             if(closestIndex < (_samples.Count - 1))
00229             {
00230                 double dist1 = Math.Abs(t - _samples.GetT(closestIndex));
00231                 double dist2 = Math.Abs(t - _samples.GetT(closestIndex + 1));
00232 
00233                 if(dist1 > dist2)
00234                 {
00235                     closestIndex++;
00236                 }
00237             }
00238 
00239             return ret;
00240         }
00241

00250         double
00251         Differentiate(
00252             double t,
00253             out double first,
00254             out double second
00255             )
00256         {
00257             throw new NotSupportedException();
00258         }
00259 
00266         public
00267         double
00268         Integrate(
00269             double t
00270             )
00271         {
00272             throw new NotSupportedException();
00273         }
00274     }
